response.overview: It depicts high school students suffering from various forms of discrimination that they have suffered in their school life, and while being encouraged by the people around them who are watching warmly, they awaken to their pride and hope and confront discrimination. The story develops between the runaway group, the soccer club, the marriage problem between the main character and the sister who are troubled between them, and the discrimination in the company. Human Rights and Dowa)
response.title: Never Give Up!
